#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Football : Chelsea beats Manchester United 1-0 to win English FA Cup
#Text=Tuesday , May 22 , 2018
#Text=London -based football club Chelsea defeated Manchester United 1 – 0 at the Wembley stadium on Monday to win the English FA Cup .

#Text=Belgian winger Eden Hazard , who was brought down by Manchester 's Phil Jones in the penalty area , scored the only goal — a 22nd minute penalty — to win the match for The Blues as they won their eight FA Cup trophy , their first since 2012 .
#Text=United had greater ball possession — 67 % , twice Chelsea 's .
#Text=Manchester had eighteen shots , managing five on target ; while the Londoners had just six shots , three on target .
#Text=Early , in the first ten minutes , Hazard attempted to score a left-footed shot in the left corner , assisted by Tiemoué Bakayoko .
#Text=Soon after 20 minutes on the clock , United defender Jones committed a foul on Hazard in the penalty area and was shown a yellow card .
#Text=Match official Martin Oliver referred to video assistant referee and awarded Chelsea a penalty kick .
#Text=Taking a short run , Hazard converted the spot-kick into a goal , sending United 's goalkeeper David De Gea in the wrong direction .
#Text=The first half ended in a 1 – 0 lead for The Blues , with Phil Jones the only one booked in that half .
#Text=In the 56th minute , United came close to equalising , but Chelsea 's goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois denied Marcus Rashford the chance to level up .
#Text=A couple of minutes later , Manchester United 's Antonio Valencia was shown yellow .
#Text=In the 63rd minute , Alexis Sanchez almost equalised for United , from Jones 's assist , but was caught offside .
#Text=Manchester made a double-substitution in the 73rd minute as Belgian forward Romelu Lukaku came on for Rashford and Anthony Martial replaced injured Jesse Lingard .
#Text=Spanish midfielder Juan Mata replaced Jones in the 87th minute , and Chelsea made their first substitution in the 89th minute when Álvaro Morata came on for Olivier Giroud .
#Text=Hazard was replaced by Willian in the injury time , and Chelsea 's Belgian goalkeeper Courtois got booked minutes before the final whistle .
#Text=This was the first domestic cup victory for the Italian manager Antonio Conte , who lost last year 's FA Cup against Arsenal FC .
#Text=Conte 's Chelsea won the Premier League last season but finished fifth this time , missing out the UEFA Champions League qualification for next season .
#Text=After the victory , Conte said , " I 'm very satisfied because today was very difficult [ ... ]

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=United 's manager and former Chelsea boss José Mourinho said ,  I congratulate them but I do n't think they deserved to win " .

column1: #Text=The Portuguese added , " Every defeat hurts , but for me personally the ones that hurt less are when you give everything and you go without any regrets . [ ... ]
